royal-upholstered-bed.title: Royal Upholstered Bed
royal-upholstered-bed.shortDescription: Handcrafted luxury bed with premium upholstery
royal-upholstered-bed.longDescription: Our Royal Upholstered Bed exemplifies the perfect marriage of comfort and craftsmanship. Each piece is meticulously handcrafted by master artisans using sustainably sourced hardwood frames and premium upholstery fabrics. The deep button-tufted headboard provides both visual interest and ergonomic support for reading in bed.

reviews.author: Priya Sharma
reviews.title: Absolutely stunning and incredibly comfortable!
reviews.content: This bed exceeded all my expectations. The craftsmanship is impeccable, and the button-tufted headboard adds such elegance to our bedroom. Assembly was straightforward, and the quality of materials is evident. Worth every rupee!

reviews.author: Rajesh Kumar
reviews.title: Great quality but delivery took longer than expected
reviews.content: The bed itself is beautiful and very well-made. The upholstery is premium and the frame feels solid. Only reason for 4 stars is the delivery took 5 weeks instead of the promised 4. But overall, very happy with the purchase.

reviews.author: Ananya Desai
reviews.title: Perfect for our master bedroom
reviews.content: We ordered the Queen size and it fits perfectly in our bedroom. The headboard is comfortable for reading, and the overall design is timeless. The customization options were great too!

reviews.author: Vikram Mehta
reviews.title: Luxury at its finest
reviews.content: This is our third purchase from Bēige & Oak and they never disappoint. The Royal Upholstered Bed is a centerpiece in our bedroom. Guests always compliment it!

faqs.question: Is installation included?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide free installation service across major cities in India. Our expert team will assemble the bed at your location and ensure everything is perfect. Installation typically takes 1-2 hours depending on the size.

faqs.question: Can I customize the fabric and color?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We offer a wide range of premium fabrics including linen, velvet, and leather in various colors. You can visit our showroom or request fabric swatches to be sent to your home. Our design consultants will help you choose the perfect combination.

faqs.question: What is the warranty period?
faqs.answer: The Royal Upholstered Bed comes with a comprehensive 1-year manufacturing warranty covering structural defects and craftsmanship issues. We also offer extended warranty options up to 5 years.

faqs.question: How long does delivery take?
faqs.answer: Standard delivery takes 4-6 weeks from order confirmation. This includes the handcrafting process and quality checks. Rush delivery options are available for an additional fee, reducing the timeline to 2-3 weeks.

faqs.question: Do you ship to all locations in India?
faqs.answer: We deliver across India to most major cities and towns. During checkout, you can verify if your pincode is serviceable. For remote locations, additional shipping charges may apply.

careInstructions.title: Care Instructions
careInstructions.content: Our Royal Upholstered Bed exemplifies the perfect marriage of comfort and craftsmanship. Each piece is meticulously handcrafted by master artisans using sustainably sourced hardwood frames and premium upholstery fabrics. The deep button-tufted headboard provides both visual interest and ergonomic support for reading in bed. For best results, vacuum upholstery weekly using a soft brush attachment. Address spills immediately by blotting (not rubbing) with a clean, white cloth. For deeper cleaning, use a professional upholstery cleaner every 12-18 months. Avoid direct sunlight to prevent fading. Rotate mattress every 3 months for even wear.

warranty.title: Warranty policy
warranty.description: Covers structural defects in the hardwood frame and manufacturing issues in upholstery. Does not cover normal wear and tear, accidental damage, or misuse. Extended warranty options available at checkout.
